infotexts.missiondescriptionneutral.pvpmission: A Mobile Infantry vessel has been dispatched from [location1] to destroy a renegade vessel at the outskirts of [location2].
infotexts.missiondescription1.pvpmission: A renegade vessel has been detected at the outskirts of [location2]. Treason against the Mobile Infantry is punishable by death—eliminate the renegades by any means necessary.
infotexts.missiondescription2.pvpmission: You're a member of the Insurrectionists, a group opposing the Mobile Infantry. According to your informants at [location1], an MI ship has just been dispatched on a mission to take you out. Eliminate their crew by any means necessary.
infotexts.missionmessage0.combatmission: The Insurrectionist vessel has been defeated by the Mobile Infantry crew!
infotexts.missionmessage1.combatmission: The Mobile Infantry vessel has been defeated by the Insurrectionist crew!
infotexts.missionsuccess.pvpmission: The [loser] vessel has been defeated by the [winner] crew!
infotexts.beaconstationactivetooltip: There's an active ‖color:gui.orange‖beacon station‖end‖ in this passageway, which helps human habitation spread into nearby locations.
infotexts.beaconstationinactivetooltip: There's an inactive ‖color:gui.orange‖beacon station‖end‖ in this passageway. Getting it back online will make it easier for human habitation to spread into nearby locations.
infotexts.huntinggroundstooltip: A creature from the outer reaches of space has made this passageway its ‖color:gui.orange‖hunting grounds‖end‖. Until the beast is dead, new outposts won't be established in the adjacent locations, and existing locations may get abandoned.
infotexts.enteremptylocation: Select a destination and leave the passageway
infotexts.undockingdisabledbymission: You cannot undock before the mission is completed.
infotexts.hostagesdiscovered: The hostages have been located, but still need to be escorted out safely. You may want to take their handcuffs off and order them to follow you.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.salvage: Find and retrieve a specific item—for example, an artifact from an alien ruin, or sensitive cargo from a destroyed spaceship.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.monster: Terminate an aggressive creature (or a group of creatures) residing within the passageway.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.cargo: Deliver cargo (such as explosives, dangerous chemicals or minerals) from one outpost to another.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.nest: Find and destroy a nest. Nests are usually located inside small caverns within the passageway.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.beacon: Locate a beacon station and get it back online by repairing any damage to the station or its systems.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.mineral: There's been talk of valuable mineral clusters within the passageway. Locate the clusters and retrieve the minerals.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.abandonedoutpost: Eradicate aggressive creatures or bandit outlaws who have taken over an abandoned outpost, or rescue hostages from one.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.clearalienruins: Clear an alien ruin of its guardians.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.escort: Escort a number of personnel from outpost to another while ensuring their safety.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.scanalienruins: Install scanners in the alien ruins. Retrieve the data by returning the scanners to the next outpost.
infotexts.missiontypedescription.pirate: Find the pirate ship and destroy it, along with its crew.
infotexts.missiondescription.beaconmission: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down—get in there, and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.
infotexts.missionmessage0.beaconmission: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.ucf_cargo_mechanical: [location2] requires a resupply of mechanical components that [location2] is willing to provide. Successful transportation will result in [reward] credits.
infotexts.missiondescription.ucf_cargo_electrical: [location2] requires a resupply of electrical components that [location2] is willing to provide. Successful transportation will result in [reward] credits.
infotexts.missiondescription.ucf_cargo_emergencyme: [location2] requires a resupply of electrical components that [location2] is willing to provide. Successful transportation will result in [reward] credits.
infotexts.missiondescription.ucf_mining_pyromorphi: [location2] requires a resupply of pyromorphite that [location2] is willing to provide. Successful transportation will result in [reward] credits.
infotexts.missiondescription.ucf_arachnidplanettak: Attempt to find out what happened to this location. [reward] credits to the first one who does so.
infotexts.missionmessage0.ucf_arachnidplanettakeov: The Bugs are dead. Navigate the spaceship out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotexts.missiondescription.ucf_arachnidoutpostta: Attempt to find out what happened to this location. [reward] credits to the first one who does so.
infotexts.missionmessage0.ucf_arachnidoutposttakeo: The Bugs are dead. Navigate the spaceship out of the cavern to claim the reward.
